In England, in the seven days to 27 October, there were 238,926 new confirmed cases (422.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 20 October, there were 277,010 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 14% (38,084 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 01 November is 7,732,441 (13,673.6 cases per 100,000 population).
